items.summary: Update the backend new-user provisioning flow so that, on first user registration only, the canister seeds initial onboarding instruction items into the userâ€™s routines: 3 items in the Morning Routine section and 3 items in the Evening Routine section. These seeded routine items must be normal routine items (user can complete/edit/delete) and must never be auto-recreated on later logins if the user deletes them.

Seed the following exact English onboarding routine texts (brief, gesture-based, with one playful line) into the routines created on first registration:
- Morning Routine (section=#top):
  1) "Create your first routine"
  2) "Tap Plan to organize"
  3) "Hold items to reorder"
- Evening Routine (section=#bottom):
  1) "Press + to add task"
  2) "Swipe + up... it's shy"
  3) "Hold + to open Plan"

Ensure seeded routine items have deterministic ordering within each section by assigning increasing `order` values (e.g., START_OFFSET, 2*START_OFFSET, 3*START_OFFSET) so that they render in the intended sequence on first load.
